data.content:
Handoff capsule (2026-02-23):
- Renamed docs/FOOLERY_ISSUE_TRACKER_INTEGRATION_API.md to docs/FOOLERY_AGENT_MEMORY_CONTRACT.md.
- Rewrote it as a tutorial: contract interfaces in TypeScript code blocks, standardized error/capability sections, Beads implementation examples, test harness usage, and quality gate checklist.
- Replaced plain file-path mentions with clickable GitHub code links throughout the contract doc.
- Updated README branding to "Agent Memory Engagement tool" and linked the new contract doc in contribution guidance.
- Quality gates run: bun run lint (warnings only, pre-existing), bunx tsc --noEmit, bun run test, bun run build.
- Commit: 535f168 (pushed to origin/main).
- Labels added: commit:535f168, stage:verification.
